tool_description: Retreives today's legislation actions active on the floor of the US Senate and US House of Representatives
title: US Congress Floor Actions

api_list.name: Senate Floor
api_list.description: Retrieves today's actions on the Senate floor
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://us-congress-floor-actions.p.rapidapi.com/floor_actions_senate.json"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "us-congress-floor-actions.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: House Floor
api_list.description: Retrieves today's actions on the House floor
